Comments: This song is a tribute to the church burnings of the Norwegian Black Metal scene.
It was also used at the theme song for WWE’s Monday Night Raw television show, being first introduced in 2010 and last used in 2012
This song was also used in the soundtrack for the second Transformers movie, Revenge of the Fallen, as well as for the trailer for the movie Date Night.
